price: 36. Ee Ammaan idilkeed iyo Mahadba Alle baa u mudan, Rabbiga samooyinka iyo Rabbiga arlada, Rabbiga uumanka oo dhan.
arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falillahi al-ḥamdu rabbi al-samāwāti warabbi al-arḍi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
